comparison-average: **Based on average of all Major/Minor/Patch releases over the last 12 months.

philosophies.community-caption: Get ready to enjoy one of the most active communities in the Vue ecosystem. Stuck on a problem? Get help right now. Find a bug? Want to talk about Firebase? Create something amazing? Let us know! Discover what others are building on the [awesome-vuetify](https://github.com/vuetifyjs/awesome-vuetify) repository.
philosophies.toolkit-caption: Vuetify is built from the ground up to be semantic. Easy to learn, easy to remember—this means that whether you are developing your own application, or onboarding a new developer, Vuetify's _write-as-you-speak_ components and properties make development a breeze.
philosophies.updates-caption: Vuetify has a consistent update cycle, allowing you to get your hands on bug fixes and enhancements more often. The development team is committed to providing you with the best experience you can have.
philosophies.support-caption: Need a customized support plan? Vuetify's author, John Leider, provides consulting and support services to assist with any use-case you run into while building your application.

premium-themes.alpha-theme: Complete theme experience including enhanced Vue CLI, full documentation, 5 custom components and much more!
premium-themes.blog: A simple template that features a clean interface for creating a blog or blog-like application.
premium-themes.dashboard: Vuetify Material Dashboard is a beautiful resource built over Vuetify, Vuex and Vue.js.
premium-themes.dashboard-pro: Vuetify Material Dashboard PRO is a beautiful theme built over Vuetify, Vuex and Vuejs.
premium-themes.freelance: A single page Material inspired theme for Freelancers.
premium-themes.material-kit: A complete set of Material Inspired themes built with Vuetify on top of Vue CLI.
premium-themes.parallax: This beautiful single page parallax is a great home page for any application.
premium-themes.zero-free: The Free version of the Zero theme.
premium-themes.zero-pro: Zero is a carefully crafted multi-purpose, responsive, and gorgeous theme that delivers a clean user experience.

ready-text: Continue your learning with related content selected by the {team} or move between pages by using the navigation links below.
